xxl.core.spatial.histograms.utils

Class MHistograms.RTreeBasicHistogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • xxl.core.spatial.histograms.utils.MHistograms.AbstractSelHistogram
      • xxl.core.spatial.histograms.utils.MHistograms.RTreeBasicHistogram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MHistogram
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MHistograms.RHistogram, MHistograms.RKHistHistogram
    Enclosing class:
    MHistograms

    public static class MHistograms.RTreeBasicHistogram
extends MHistograms.AbstractSelHistogram
    This is a groundwork class for R-tree based histograms. This class provides method for R-tree bulk loading. To bulk load an R-tree a sort based algorithm is used. In case of 2 dimensions a hilbert comparator is used, otherwise we use a Z-Curve.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int bitProDim
      number of bits used in a SFC key computation.
      protected int blockSize
      Blocks size of R-tree
      protected int bulkLoad
      bulk load type
      protected Comparator<DoublePointRectangle> comparator
      comparator, based on SFC mapping; For two-dimensional space we use Hilbert, otherwise Z-Curve.
      protected Converter<DoublePointRectangle> converter
      input rectangle (DoublePointRectangle) converter
      protected int dimension
      number of dimensions, default 2
      protected double loadRatio
      average target R-tree page capacity, defined by the fraction of page capacity default value 0.8
      protected int partitionSize
      maximal number of entries for optimal partitioning computation during the loading of R-tree, default value 50.000 rectangles
      protected int precision
      mask for SFC computation
      protected String rtreePath
      Path were temporal R-tree is stored
      protected double rtreeRatio
      min R-tree page capacity, defined by the fraction of page capacity default value 0.33
      protected String sortpath
      Path were temporal sort files are stored
